page.title: 15Hellingly School.
page.content: Hellingly School is'nt a very big school.It has about seven classrooms and a big field for infants and juniors. They have recently built an animal enclosure. They had two guinea pigs, one rabbit, two ducks and a small pond for the ducks. The school hall was once three separate classrooms and in one of the classrooms there was a school bell which they used to ring to tell people to come to school. The bell is still there with a picture underneath showing children ringing the bell.Some of the teachers sit in a small hut at break. There are roughly 130 children in the school, aged from 5 to 11. Hellingly School is a nice school. The children and teachers were very friendly, and the children don't wear School uniform. by Julie Russell
